name: I Just Want to Grill
description:
You work, cook burgs, don't die.

Made over the span of about a week, this is the result of a really bad joke.

Cook the burgs on your shift at the Burg Emporium.

Beware of dangerous creatures while you work, or your manager, Dan, will fire you.

Simply put, I've lost too much sleep for this game, hope you all like it.
